ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Quickstrike: Quickstrike groaned to himself from the pain. He was tired and alone, as well as angry. For a few minutes, he lost interest in everything.

Subject: Neo Beast Wars

From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>

Quickstrike:










Quickstrike groaned to himself from the pain. He was tired and alone, as 
well as angry. For a few minutes, he lost interest in everything.

"Quickstrike, Terrorize!" he commanded his activation code. He quickly 
transformed to his robot mode, twisting his body parts around. His claws 
widened until they were flat, and he cried out as he put pressure on his 
legs. He stumbled forward and found himself on the ground.

He grunted and used his awkward hands and arms to lift himself up. He was 
actually risking alot in this mode. He could be more easier detected.

He sat up, and rolled his trunk, groaning loudly, a little too loudly than 
he wanted. His leg hurt, badly. Transulas did a good job with wrapping his 
leg up, but all it did was keep his leg from bending and causing him more 
pain. He slowly stood, up and tried his luck on his leg, but only managed to 
get anywhere. He stumbled to the side, and fell across a log. His legs 
kicked up. His left leg remained elevated into the air.

He groaned and tilted his head up. He slowly sat up, sitting on the log he 
fell over.

"Dang."

He looked over and saw a small cluster of downed branches. He picked one up, 
and saw it wasn't the right form. He reached over again and pulled up a 
longer, sturdier branch. It would make for a fair walking stick. He could 
use it for balance if it didn't break.

He then opened his comm-link to Megatron's troops. "Anyone out there? Anyone 
at all?"
